actions_and_stuff.title: Actions and Stuff
actions_and_stuff.description: The Animation Pack You Didn't Know You Needed: Bring your world to life with new animations particles textures and more! - Player Animations (1st & 3rd Person) - New & Improved Mob Animations - 3D Item Models - Custom Armour - A Complete & Faithful Texture Overhaul - Compatible with Vanilla textures or your own texture packs - So much more!

a_minecraft_movie_dlc.title: A Minecraft Movie DLC
a_minecraft_movie_dlc.description: Adventure deeper into A MINECRAFT MOVIE! Compete in elytra races, survive the night, and sneak into a woodland mansion in this free DLC.

better_on_bedrock.title: Better on Bedrock
better_on_bedrock.description:
Explore a new world of Minecraft with Better on Bedrock, anew Dynamic World! There is tons to explore!

-Custom trees,biomes and structure generation
-100+ New blocks and items
-20+ New mobs
4-40+ New Foods & Quests
-7 New Bosses
-Enjoy custom music and ambiencie

This item uses random start areas for any new world.Endless possibilties!
